content:
Scenario: Community caregiver support networks connect isolated caregivers
    Given James is profoundly isolated by intensive caregiving
    And connection to other caregivers is essential for survival
    When the community_elohim connects caregivers
    Then James should access support groups for Alzheimer's caregivers
    And he should connect with other sandwich generation caregivers
    And he should find LGBTQ+ caregiver community if desired
    And support networks should provide practical advice and emotional support
    And community should actively prevent caregiver isolation
